name: Chris Yeagy
body:
#hello
I write software, primarily for the JVM.

Here are my contributions to open source:
* [Better SQL Support](https://github.com/cyeagy/bss) is a JDBC utility library. This grew from loathing how JDBC handles null columns and primitive types. Later expanded to a neat java 8 API around JDBC. Finally finished off with a simple ORM that fits my tastes, which is actually a distaste... for hibernate.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
